Manager.description: In Redfish, a manager is a systems management entity that may implement or provide access to a Redfish service.  Examples of managers are BMCs, enclosure managers, management controllers, and other subsystems that are assigned manageability functions.  An implementation may have multiple managers, which may or may not be directly accessible through a Redfish-defined interface.
Manager.longDescription: This resource shall represent a management subsystem for a Redfish implementation.

title: #Manager.Manager
